reviewText: A beautifully acted (Emma Suarez and Carmelo Gomez, one of the sexiest pairings in Spanish cinema of the last 20 or 30 years) and visually scrumptious version of Lope's skewering of hypocrisy, and generally Golden Age values, or lack thereof. No one comes off clean here, but passion abounds and when two people are in love, they can be deadly, as these two are.
